name: BG3_Quest01
description: Take control of the nautiloid and escape the Hells.

name: BG3_Quest09
description: Complete ten background goals in a single playthrough - you are one with your character.

name: BG3_Quest10
description: Take four full Long Rests in a single playthrough - adventuring's tiring work.

name: BG3_Quest12
description: Dig up five buried chests in a single playthrough - treasure!

name: BG3_Quest13
description: Successfully use Detect Thoughts to pry into someone's thoughts.

name: BG3_Quest14
description: Break out of prison after being arrested - aren't you daring?

name: BG3_Quest15
description: Recruit a hireling. You can befriend them or use them as cannon-fodder - we won't judge.

name: BG3_Quest16
description: Multiclass into every class in one playthrough without asking Withers to change your character.

name: BG3_Quest17
description: Create three unique alchemical solutions in a single playthrough - bottoms up!

name: BG3_Quest18
displayName: You Have Two Hands for a Reason

name: BG3_Quest19
displayName: Rude, Crude, and Full of Attitude

name: BG3_Quest27
displayName: Kill Two Birds With One Gnome
description: Use one enemy as an improvised weapon against another.

name: BG3_Quest28
description: Earn a hundred gold from playing sweet, sweet music in a single playthrough.

name: BG3_Quest29
description: Perform five attacks in one turn. Your enemies won't know what hit them (literally).

name: BG3_Quest30
description: Kill a character with an Unarmed Strike.

name: BG3_Quest31
description: Defeat Commander Zhalk on the nautiloid.

name: BG3_Quest34
description: Kill the Surgeon before he performs surgery on you in combat.

name: BG3_Quest35
description: Defeat the Toll Collector without her using gold against you - excellent budgeting.

name: BG3_Quest37
description: Defeat Gortash in Wyrm's Rock without activating any traps.

name: BG3_Quest40
description: In the Wyrmway, wait until the dragon is mid-flight, then knock it out of the sky - KAPOW.

name: BG3_Quest41
description: Long Rest using only alcohol - a time-honoured dwarven tradition.

name: BG3_Quest42
description: Kill a creature with falling damage.

name: BG3_Quest43
description: Read 100 different books in a single playthrough. Adventuring isn't just daring quests, you know.

name: BG3_Quest44
description: Defeat twenty opponents while a party character is drunk in a single playthough - down them.

name: BG3_Quest45
description: Play fetch with Scratch - the best boy in the Realms.

name: BG3_Quest53
description: Complete the game in Tactician mode.
